tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE marathon_history (
    race_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    race_name VARCHAR(255),
    race_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    total_participants INT
);

CREATE TABLE marathon_results (
  athlete_id INT,
  athlete_name VARCHAR(255),
  race_date DATE,
  finishing_time TIME,
  ranking INT
);

CREATE TABLE marathon_courses (
  course_id INT,
  course_name VARCHAR(255),
  distance_km FLOAT,
  elevation_gain_m INT,
  city VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE athlete_details (
  athlete_id INT,
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender CHAR(1),
  height_cm INT
);

CREATE TABLE race_results (
  race_id INT,
  athlete_id INT,
  finishing_rank INT,
  course_id INT,
  completion_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE race_results (
    race_id INT,
    athlete_id INT,
    finishing_time TIME,
    ranking INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (race_id) REFERENCES races(race_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (athlete_id) REFERENCES athletes(athlete_id)
);
